response_time_3.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_3.translation: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.

accel_limit_4.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_4.translation: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.english: The maximum filter applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.translation: The maximum filter applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.

response_time_2.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_2.translation: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.

accel_limit_1.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_1.translation: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.

accel_limit_2.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_2.translation: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.translation: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.

accel_limit_3.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_3.translation: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.

response_time_4.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_4.translation: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.

yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic ceiling.
yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.translation: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic ceiling.

response_time_1.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_1.translation: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.

rescue_flip_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli flips during inverted rescue.
rescue_flip_gain.translation: Determine how aggressively the heli flips during inverted rescue.

rescue_level_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli levels during rescue.
rescue_level_gain.translation: Determine how aggressively the heli levels during rescue.

rescue_max_setpoint_rate.english: Limit rescue roll/pitch rate. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.
rescue_max_setpoint_rate.translation: Limit rescue roll/pitch rate. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.

rescue_flip_mode.english: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted.
rescue_flip_mode.translation: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted.

rescue_pull_up_time.english: When rescue is activated, helicopter will apply pull-up collective for this time period before moving to flip or climb stage.
rescue_pull_up_time.translation: When rescue is activated, helicopter will apply pull-up collective for this time period before moving to flip or climb stage.

rescue_exit_time.english: This limits rapid application of negative collective if the helicopter has rolled during rescue.
rescue_exit_time.translation: This limits rapid application of negative collective if the helicopter has rolled during rescue.

rescue_max_setpoint_accel.english: Limit how fast the helicopter accelerates into a roll/pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.
rescue_max_setpoint_accel.translation: Limit how fast the helicopter accelerates into a roll/pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.

rescue_flip_time.english: If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not within this time, rescue will be aborted.
rescue_flip_time.translation: If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not within this time, rescue will be aborted.

rescue_climb_time.english: Length of time the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.
rescue_climb_time.translation: Length of time the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.

half_duplex.english: Half duplex mode for ESC telemetry
half_duplex.translation: Half duplex mode for ESC telemetry

pin_swap.english: Swap the TX and RX pins for the ESC telemetry
pin_swap.translation: Swap the TX and RX pins for the ESC telemetry

cell_count.english: Number of cells in the battery
cell_count.translation: Number of cells in the battery

temperature_protection.english: Temperature at which we cut power by 50%
temperature_protection.translation: Temperature at which we cut power by 50%

low_voltage_protection.english: Voltage at which we cut power by 50%
low_voltage_protection.translation: Voltage at which we cut power by 50%

current_gain.english: Gain value for the current sensor
current_gain.translation: Gain value for the current sensor

governor_tta_gain.english: TTA gain applied to increase headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. motorised tail less than idle speed).
governor_tta_gain.translation: TTA gain applied to increase headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. motorised tail less than idle speed).

governor_collective_ff_weight.english: Collective precompensation weight - how much collective is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_collective_ff_weight.translation: Collective precompensation weight - how much collective is mixed into the feedforward.

governor_cyclic_ff_weight.english: Cyclic precompensation weight - how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_cyclic_ff_weight.translation: Cyclic precompensation weight - how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward.

governor_headspeed.english: Target headspeed for the current profile.
governor_headspeed.translation: Target headspeed for the current profile.

governor_min_throttle.english: Minimum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.
governor_min_throttle.translation: Minimum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

governor_yaw_ff_weight.english: Yaw precompensation weight - how much yaw is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_yaw_ff_weight.translation: Yaw precompensation weight - how much yaw is mixed into the feedforward.

governor_max_throttle.english: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.
governor_max_throttle.translation: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

governor_tta_limit.english: TTA max headspeed increase over full headspeed.
governor_tta_limit.translation: TTA max headspeed increase over full headspeed.

gyro_cutoff_1.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_1.translation: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.

yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.english: Cutoff. Derivative cutoff frequency in 1/10Hz steps. Controls how sharp the precomp is. Higher value is sharper.
yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.translation: Cutoff. Derivative cutoff frequency in 1/10Hz steps. Controls how sharp the precomp is. Higher value is sharper.

offset_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_0.translation: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.

cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.english: Amount of roll-to-pitch compensation needed, vs. pitch-to-roll.
cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.translation: Amount of roll-to-pitch compensation needed, vs. pitch-to-roll.

yaw_precomp_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.
yaw_precomp_cutoff.translation: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.

error_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_0.translation: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.

trainer_gain.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_gain.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode.

gyro_cutoff_2.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_2.translation: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.

trainer_angle_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_angle_limit.translation: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Acro Trainer Mode.

yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.english: Cyclic feedforward mixed into yaw (cyclic-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.translation: Cyclic feedforward mixed into yaw (cyclic-to-yaw precomp).

error_decay_time_cyclic.english: Time constant for bleeding off cyclic I-term. Higher will stabilize hover, lower will drift.
error_decay_time_cyclic.translation: Time constant for bleeding off cyclic I-term. Higher will stabilize hover, lower will drift.

error_decay_limit_cyclic.english: Maximum bleed-off speed for cyclic I-term.
error_decay_limit_cyclic.translation: Maximum bleed-off speed for cyclic I-term.

cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.english: Amount of compensation applied for pitch-to-roll decoupling.
cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.translation: Amount of compensation applied for pitch-to-roll decoupling.

yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.english: Decay time for the extra yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.translation: Decay time for the extra yaw precomp on collective input.

pitch_collective_ff_gain.english: Increasing will compensate for the pitching up motion caused by tail drag when climbing.
pitch_collective_ff_gain.translation: Increasing will compensate for the pitching up motion caused by tail drag when climbing.

iterm_relax_type.english: Choose the axes in which this is active. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.
iterm_relax_type.translation: Choose the axes in which this is active. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.

offset_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_1.translation: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.

iterm_relax_cutoff_1.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_1.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.

error_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_1.translation: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.

horizon_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Horizon Mode.
horizon_level_strength.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Horizon Mode.

error_limit_2.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_2.translation: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.

iterm_relax_cutoff_2.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_2.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.

yaw_collective_ff_gain.english: Collective feedforward mixed into yaw (collective-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_collective_ff_gain.translation: Collective feedforward mixed into yaw (collective-to-yaw precomp).

gyro_cutoff_0.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_0.translation: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.

yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.english: An extra boost of yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.translation: An extra boost of yaw precomp on collective input.

cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for the compensation. Higher value will make the compensation action faster.
cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.translation: Frequency limit for the compensation. Higher value will make the compensation action faster.

error_rotation.english: Rotates the current roll and pitch error terms around yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.
error_rotation.translation: Rotates the current roll and pitch error terms around yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.

angle_level_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Angle mode.
angle_level_limit.translation: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Angle mode.

iterm_relax_cutoff_0.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_0.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.

yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.english: Scalar gain. The strength of the main rotor inertia. Higher value means more precomp is applied to yaw control.
yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.translation: Scalar gain. The strength of the main rotor inertia. Higher value means more precomp is applied to yaw control.

angle_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Angle Mode.
angle_level_strength.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Angle Mode.

error_decay_time_ground.english: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne to stop the craft tipping over.
error_decay_time_ground.translation: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne to stop the craft tipping over.

swash_trim_1.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_1.translation: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.

tail_motor_idle.english: Minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop.
tail_motor_idle.translation: Minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop.

tail_center_trim.english: Sets tail rotor trim for 0 yaw for variable pitch, or tail motor throttle for 0 yaw for motorized.
tail_center_trim.translation: Sets tail rotor trim for 0 yaw for variable pitch, or tail motor throttle for 0 yaw for motorized.

swash_trim_2.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_2.translation: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.

swash_geo_correction.english: Adjust if there is too much negative collective or too much positive collective.
swash_geo_correction.translation: Adjust if there is too much negative collective or too much positive collective.

swash_trim_0.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_0.translation: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.

swash_phase.english: Phase offset for the swashplate controls.
swash_phase.translation: Phase offset for the swashplate controls.

collective_tilt_correction_pos.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for positive collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_pos.translation: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for positive collective pitch.

collective_tilt_correction_neg.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for negative collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_neg.translation: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for negative collective pitch.

swash_pitch_limit.english: Maximum amount of combined cyclic and collective blade pitch.
swash_pitch_limit.translation: Maximum amount of combined cyclic and collective blade pitch.

minthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at low throttle
minthrottle.translation: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at low throttle

motor_pwm_protocol.english: The protocol used to communicate with the ESC
motor_pwm_protocol.translation: The protocol used to communicate with the ESC

maxthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at full throttle
maxthrottle.translation: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at full throttle

mincommand.english: This PWM value is sent when the motor is stopped
mincommand.translation: This PWM value is sent when the motor is stopped

motor_pwm_rate.english: The frequency at which the ESC sends PWM signals to the motor
motor_pwm_rate.translation: The frequency at which the ESC sends PWM signals to the motor

motor_pole_count_0.english: The number of magnets on the motor bell.
motor_pole_count_0.translation: The number of magnets on the motor bell.

vbatmincellvoltage.english: The minimum voltage per cell before the low voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmincellvoltage.translation: The minimum voltage per cell before the low voltage alarm is triggered.

vbatmaxcellvoltage.english: The maximum voltage per cell before the high voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmaxcellvoltage.translation: The maximum voltage per cell before the high voltage alarm is triggered.

vbatwarningcellvoltage.english: The voltage per cell at which the low voltage alarm will start to sound.
vbatwarningcellvoltage.translation: The voltage per cell at which the low voltage alarm will start to sound.

batteryCellCount.english: The number of cells in your battery.
batteryCellCount.translation: The number of cells in your battery.

vbatfullcellvoltage.english: The nominal voltage of a fully charged cell.
vbatfullcellvoltage.translation: The nominal voltage of a fully charged cell.

batteryCapacity.english: The milliamp hour capacity of your battery.
batteryCapacity.translation: The milliamp hour capacity of your battery.

pitch.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
pitch.translation: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).

roll.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
roll.translation: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).

pid_1_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_1_I.translation: How tightly the system holds its position.

pid_2_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_2_P.translation: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.

pid_2_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_2_I.translation: How tightly the system holds its position.

pid_1_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from pitching when using high collective.
pid_1_O.translation: Used to prevent the craft from pitching when using high collective.

pid_1_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_1_F.translation: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_0_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_0_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_1_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_1_P.translation: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.

pid_0_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_0_I.translation: How tightly the system holds its position.

pid_2_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_2_B.translation: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.

pid_0_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from rolling when using high collective.
pid_0_O.translation: Used to prevent the craft from rolling when using high collective.

pid_0_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_0_F.translation: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_2_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_2_F.translation: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_2_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_2_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_0_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_0_P.translation: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.

pid_1_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_1_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_0_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_0_B.translation: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.

pid_1_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_1_B.translation: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.

gov_tracking_time.english: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_tracking_time.translation: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

gov_recovery_time.english: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_recovery_time.translation: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

gov_startup_time.english: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_startup_time.translation: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

gov_handover_throttle.english: Governor activates above this %. Below this the input throttle is passed to the ESC.
gov_handover_throttle.translation: Governor activates above this %. Below this the input throttle is passed to the ESC.

gov_spoolup_time.english: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_spoolup_time.translation: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

gov_spoolup_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle to use for slow spoolup, in percent. For electric motors the default is 5%, for nitro this should be set so the clutch starts to engage for a smooth spoolup 10-15%.
gov_spoolup_min_throttle.translation: Minimum throttle to use for slow spoolup, in percent. For electric motors the default is 5%, for nitro this should be set so the clutch starts to engage for a smooth spoolup 10-15%.

rc_deflection.english: Stick deflection from center in microseconds (us).
rc_deflection.translation: Stick deflection from center in microseconds (us).

rc_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle (0% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_min_throttle.translation: Minimum throttle (0% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).

rc_max_throttle.english: Maximum throttle (100% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_max_throttle.translation: Maximum throttle (100% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).

rc_arm_throttle.english: Throttle must be at or below this value in microseconds (us) to allow arming. Must be at least 10us lower than minimum throttle.
rc_arm_throttle.translation: Throttle must be at or below this value in microseconds (us) to allow arming. Must be at least 10us lower than minimum throttle.

rc_yaw_deadband.english: Deadband for yaw control in microseconds (us).
rc_yaw_deadband.translation: Deadband for yaw control in microseconds (us).

rc_deadband.english: Deadband for cyclic control in microseconds (us).
rc_deadband.translation: Deadband for cyclic control in microseconds (us).

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.translation: Width of the notch filter in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_static_hz.translation: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.

dyn_notch_max_hz.english: Maximum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_max_hz.translation: Maximum frequency to which the notch is applied.

rpm_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency for the RPM filter.
rpm_min_hz.translation: Minimum frequency for the RPM filter.

dyn_notch_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_min_hz.translation: Minimum frequency to which the notch is applied.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.english: Dynamic filter max cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.translation: Dynamic filter max cutoff in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.translation: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.translation: Width of the notch filter in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.translation: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.

dyn_notch_q.english: Quality factor of the notch filter.
dyn_notch_q.translation: Quality factor of the notch filter.

gyro_lpf2_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf2_static_hz.translation: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.english: Dynamic filter min cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.translation: Dynamic filter min cutoff in Hz.
